snippet: Kevin Love departure in the final minute of the second quarter with a left shoulder injury marred the Cleveland Cavaliers' 120-111 victory over Kobe Bryant and the Los Angeles Lakers on Wednesday....
lead_paragraph: Kevin Love departure in the final minute of the second quarter with a left shoulder injury marred the Cleveland Cavaliers' 120-111 victory over Kobe Bryant and the Los Angeles Lakers on Wednesday.

headline.main: Love Injury Overshadows Kobe's Cleveland Farewell
headline.print_headline: Love Injury Overshadows Kobe's Cleveland Farewell
